column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I parked my car at the airport parking lot .
#id=2
#text=I boarded a shuttle bus that took me to the airline departures .
#id=3
#text=I headed in the airport with my suitcase .
#id=4
#text=Found the proper line for my airline , and stood in line waiting with a lot of other passengers .
#id=5
#text=When I got up to the desk , I checked my luggage in and was given a boarding pass for my flight .
#id=6
#text=I then walked over to the security line to get into the airport terminal .
#id=7
#text=I waited in line for a long time .
#id=8
#text=I showed a TSA agent my driver 's license and boarding pass .
#id=9
#text=I then had to take off my shoes and put all my belongings on a belt to be x-rayed .
#text=Then I walked through a metal detector and the TSA agent motioned for me to move on .
#text=I gathered up my belongings , put my shoes back on and found my gate .
#text=I waited with the other passengers until it was time to board the airplane .
#text=We then walked in a line through the doors , down a long hallway , and into the airplane .
#text=On the airplane I found my seat .
#text=The airplane taxied down the runway and took off .
#text=After a long while , the flight attendant passed out beverages and snacks to everyone .
#text=I drank my beverage , ate my snack and fell asleep .
#text=When I woke up we were landing .
#text=We had to taxi down the runway and wait until a gate was available .
#text=Once the airplane had stopped , the signal came on that we could take our seat belts off and get up .
#text=The doors open and we all exited off the plane .
